forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plenty of sunshine. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening then continued cloudy and windy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 45F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 11C. E winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
